name: Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight
name_original: Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight
description: Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight (新・世界樹の迷宮2 ファフニールの騎士 Shin Sekaiju no Meikyū 2: Fafuniiru no Kishi, lit. New Labyrinth of the World Tree 2: The Fafnir Knight) is the remake of Etrian Odyssey II: Heroes of Lagaard, and is the second game in the Etrian Odyssey Untold sub-series, after Etrian Odyssey Untold: The Millennium Girl. Like said game, The Knight of Fafnir also includes a Story Mode. The game has been released in North America on August 4, 2015 and in Europe February 12, 2016.
